item.title: Security Concepts
item.description: 1. What is cybersecurity ? Cybersecurity refers to any technologies, practices and policies for preventing cyberattacks or mitigating their impact. The aim is to protect computer systems, applications, devices, data, financial assets and people against cyberthreats. 1 IBM: What is cybersecurity? - https://www.ibm.com/topics/cybersecurity - Topics in cybersecurity ↩︎
